Title: O Captain! My Captain!
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Marc Firek, Lacey Marisa Friedman (executive story editor), Lauren Bans (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Barry tries to prove Beverly wrong in his chemistry class while Adam needs Erica's advice for his friendship with Emmy.
